mapper.sql: a.service_id AS "serviceId", a.backgoodscount AS "backgoodscount", a.channel_return_count AS "channelReturnCount", a.channel_return_money AS "channelReturnMoney", a.channel_return_date AS "channelReturnDate", a.ems_comp AS "emsComp", a.ems_id AS "emsId", a.error_remark AS "errorRemark", a.log_id AS "logId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.return_addr AS "returnAddr", a.return_ems_time AS "returnEmsTime", a.return_ems_remark AS "returnEmsRemark", a.return_money AS "returnMoney", a.return_ems_money AS "returnEmsMoney", a.returnedmoney AS "returnedmoney", a.send_count AS "sendCount", a.service_crt_time AS "serviceCrtTime", a.service_modify_time AS "serviceModifyTime", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.service_remark AS "serviceRemark", a.service_return_state AS "serviceReturnState", a.service_state AS "serviceState", a.service_type AS "serviceType", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.return_platform_deduct AS "returnPlatformDeduct", a.service_crt_mon_no AS "serviceCrtMonNo", u25.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u25 ON u25.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_customer_service( service_id, backgoodscount, channel_return_count, channel_return_money, channel_return_date, ems_comp, ems_id, error_remark, log_id, order_id, return_addr, return_ems_time, return_ems_remark, return_money, return_ems_money, returnedmoney, send_count, service_crt_time, service_modify_time, service_name, service_remark, service_return_state, service_state, service_type, user_id, return_platform_deduct, service_crt_mon_no ) VALUES ( #{serviceId}, #{backgoodscount}, #{channelReturnCount}, #{channelReturnMoney}, #{channelReturnDate}, #{emsComp}, #{emsId}, #{errorRemark}, #{logId}, #{orderId}, #{returnAddr}, #{returnEmsTime}, #{returnEmsRemark}, #{returnMoney}, #{returnEmsMoney}, #{returnedmoney}, #{sendCount}, #{serviceCrtTime}, #{serviceModifyTime}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceRemark}, #{serviceReturnState}, #{serviceState}, #{serviceType}, #{user.id}, #{returnPlatformDeduct}, #{serviceCrtMonNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_customer_service SET service_id = #{serviceId}, backgoodscount = #{backgoodscount}, channel_return_count = #{channelReturnCount}, channel_return_money = #{channelReturnMoney}, channel_return_date = #{channelReturnDate}, ems_comp = #{emsComp}, ems_id = #{emsId}, error_remark = #{errorRemark}, log_id = #{logId}, order_id = #{orderId}, return_addr = #{returnAddr}, return_ems_time = #{returnEmsTime}, return_ems_remark = #{returnEmsRemark}, return_money = #{returnMoney}, return_ems_money = #{returnEmsMoney}, returnedmoney = #{returnedmoney}, send_count = #{sendCount}, service_crt_time = #{serviceCrtTime}, service_modify_time = #{serviceModifyTime}, service_name = #{serviceName}, service_remark = #{serviceRemark}, service_return_state = #{serviceReturnState}, service_state = #{serviceState}, service_type = #{serviceType}, user_id = #{user.id}, return_platform_deduct = #{returnPlatformDeduct}, service_crt_mon_no = #{serviceCrtMonNo} WHERE id = #{id}
